Package org.robolectric.shadows.httpclient Description

Shadows for Apache HTTP Client.

To use this in your project, add the artifact org.robolectric:shadows-httpclient to your project. These shadows are only provided for legacy compatibility. They are no longer actively maintained and will be removed in a future release.
